price: The life of this world is nothing but amusement and play, and the Abode of the Hereafter is indeed the real life, if only they knew.
arabic: وَمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا لَهۡوٞ وَلَعِبٞۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ لَهِيَ ٱلۡحَيَوَانُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā illā lahwun walaʿibun wa-inna al-dāra al-ākhirata lahiya al-ḥayawānu law kānū yaʿlamūna
